scripts.flat:exchange: truffle-flattener contracts/exchange/MakiswapFactory.sol > flats/MakiswapFactory_flat.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/exchange/MakiswapRouter.sol > flats/MakiswapRouter_flat.sol
scripts.flat:chefs: truffle-flattener contracts/farm/MasterChef.sol > flats/MasterChef_flat.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/farm/SousChef.sol > flats/SousChef_flat.sol
scripts.flat:tokens: truffle-flattener contracts/farm/MakiToken.sol > flats//MakiToken_flat.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/farm/SoyBar.sol > flats/SoyBar_flat.sol
